description: Kinzou`s second daughter, and the youngest of her siblings. She seems sensible and soothing. Her husband disappeared long before the beginning of the story. Although she appears to be kind and earnest, she often scolds Maria quite violently for her childishness and her interest in the occult. She handles a design company and seeks Kinzou`s fortune to repay her co-endorsers.
name: Ushiromiya Rosa
